data.title: Saving Hospitals, Saving Jobs, Saving ...
data.meta_description: Prime Healthcare is the fifth largest for-profit health system in the United States operating 44 hospitals in 14 states, more than 300 outpatient locations, and nearly 45,000 employees and affiliated physicians dedicated to providing the highest quality, value-based healthcare.
data.text:
Saving Lives

Starts with Saving Hospitals

Nationally recognized.

Locally preferred.

Together We’re Building

A Healthier Tomorrow

Looking for an exciting place

to work and help others?

About Prime Healthcare

Prime Healthcare is the fifth largest for-profit health system in the United States operating 44 hospitals in 14 states, more than 300 outpatient locations, and nearly 45,000 employees and affiliated physicians dedicated to providing the highest quality, value-based healthcare. Fourteen

of the Prime Healthcare hospitals are members of the Prime Healthcare Foundation, a

501(c)(3) not-for-profit public charity.

We believe that all healthcare is local. Explore a hospital in your community.

Environmental, Social, Governance Report

Our Planet, our People, our Ethics and Integrity

As a company steeped in our values of quality, compassion, community and physician-led leadership, Prime Healthcare has always held ourselves to exceptionally high standards. Through our work in quality, value-based care, we are accountable to building a healthier and more equitable future for those we employ and those we serve.

Please enjoy Prime Healthcare’s 2023 environmental, social and governance report that shares our ongoing work to strengthen communities.

We’ll Be By Your Side

We believe saving lives starts with saving hospitals. That’s why we deliver the highest standards of care and invest in community hospitals across America. Prime Healthcare and the non-profit Prime Healthcare Foundation are honored to be by your side, providing compassionate care when you need it most. Click on the play button to view our highlights video.

Celebrating Our Heroes

Prime Healthcare thanks our teams for their heroic efforts today and every day. This video celebrates our healthcare heroes across the country.

Learn About the Prime Healthcare Difference: Watch our Videos
